HOME.TITLE: Welcome,
HOME.SUBTITLE: What are you interested in?
HOME.DESCRIPTION:
I consider myself a developer with a soul designer, creative and detailed in the quality of my code and in the final product. I have worked as a full-stack since 2008, but always dedicating a special treat to my preferred language: Javascritpt and its design patterns.

I am constantly moving, always investing my time in learning and discovering new technologies and their applications.

I'm currently making a robot with a Raspberry.

WORKFLOW.NAME: Workflow
WORKFLOW.SUBTITLE: Remembering the roots
WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION:
Afortunado por haber trabajado en empresas punteras, en proyectos modernos y junto a grandes profesionales que me han visto crecer profesionalmente.
